input.name: __VIEWSTATE

div.style: position: absolute; left: 0px; top: 0px; z-index: 100001; background-color: rgb(170, 170, 170); opacity: 0.5; display: none;

div.p:
_______________________________________________________________
IT'S A BLUE & GOLD THING...
I can truly say that Trinidad ISD is a family. Trinidad ISD is a small/big community supported school. We are small in number but big in heart and success. We are located approximately 65 miles southeast of Dallas. We have generations of success stories behind us, and the potential to create many more in the future. We know that challenges create opportunities. We gain strength from one another and from the support of our community partners. East of Kerens, South of Seven Points, and West of Malakoff lies a diamond in the rough. We excel in academics, athletics, and in giving opportunities to everyone. The key ingredient in all of our accomplishments has been love. When love is present, there’s always hope. This is a special place. It’s not too late to “Be Part of Something Bigger Than Yourself”. Join the family today with your presence, ideas, gifts, and talents. Be a Trinidad Trojan.

p.a: READ THE BUILDING OF THIS TRADITION.

div.div: Trinidad Independent School District ADOPTED A TAX RATE THAT WILL RAISE MORE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS THAN LAST YEAR'S TAX RATE. THE TAX RATE WILL EFFECTIVELY BE RAISED BY 0 PERCENT AND WILL RAISE TAXES FOR MAINTENANCE AND OPERATIONS ON A $100,000 HOME BY APPROXIMATELY $-101.70. ...
div.a: Read More About Notice of Adopted 2019 Tax Rate
